results.content:
Comprehensive course on Heroku cloud computing both for beginners and professionals. 

Covered all the major services in categories, with theoretical as well as a lot of practical demonstrations.
results.content_html:
Comprehensive course on Heroku cloud computing both for beginners and professionals.

Covered all the major services in categories, with theoretical as well as a lot of practical demonstrations.

results.content: It is helpful, but I find the facilitator is pretty much just reading the different options that appear in the menu options. There is very little additional clarifications.

results.content:
Heroku is a creative solution when it comes to Cloud Computing and PaaS. Its future is very promising, and i am currently shifting on Heroku from AWS due to certain reasons.

This course was beneficial to me in learning Heroku Cloud services.

results.content: a lot of services and tools are taught here in a simple to understand with easy to implement examples on heroku cloud platform. Heroku has huge potentials with its wide range of services offered and one can build great applications on it.

results.content: A unique course on generally underestimated cloud services offered by Salesforce. People generally go with aws, gcp, or Microsoft Azure. But when you go through this course you will soon realise the power of Salesforce heroku.
